attributes.action: Make all clothes shops display their ethical ratings so customers can see them.
attributes.background: Pass a law that all clothes shops must display their ethical ratings where all customers can see them - for example on the door to the shop.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want clothes shops to be required to show how ethical they are, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There is no official ethical rating of companies that shops could be required to display.
                
You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
